item.title: Plotly Dashboard Assignment
item.description: Tutorials Create a Plotly Dashboard in under 10 minutes (Easy) Create a dashboard with Pusher and Flask (Advanced) Assignment In the Mobile Money Data Visualisation Assignment, you created graphs to display the relationship between the type of financial services accessed (non-mobile, mobile, both), how frequently these services were accessed, and socio-demographic information about the users (gender, land ownership type of income, and so forth). Create a Plotly dashboard of the 3-5 most informative graphs from this assignment.
